artist: Engraver: Gabrielle Perelle; Engraver: Nicolas de Poilly
description: wooded landsacape; two shepherds. one mounted, with cows, sheep and goat walking on lane; figure with pack on back following; two figures in front conversing; chateau middle ground left; two figures middle ground right
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: Perelle invent et fecit  N. de Poilly execudit / avec privilege du Roy  | on sheet in pencil: 2-217
title: Print
